name: Cyber Center
description: The SF LGBT Center gives LGBTQ people access to communication and technology through their Cyber Cente, which provides the following: - 9 computer stations - Free internet access - Scanning and printing services (on request) - Access to free educational programs How to Apply: - Drop-in during open hours. Open Hours: - Monday to Thursday: 1PM to 4PM Service Contact Information: - Phone number: 415-865-5661 - Email: cybercenter@sfcenter.org
